headline: How we built it: the technology behind Cloudflare Radar 2.0
keywords: Developer Week, Cloudflare Radar, Cloudflare Workers, Cloudflare Pages
description: Radar 2.0 was launched last month during Cloudflare's Birthday Week as a complete product revamp. This blog explains how we built it technically. Hopefully, it will inspire other developers to build complex web apps using Cloudflare products.
